name: gap_id
description: Gap ID (hash of ssvid, gap_start, gap_start_lat, and gap_start_lon).

name: gap_ssvid
description: ssvid

name: gap_version
description: The time in which the gap was created.

name: positions_hours_before
description: Number of positions N hours before the gap start.

name: positions_hours_before_sat
description: Number of satellite positions N hours before the gap start.

name: positions_hours_before_ter
description: Number of terrestrial positions N hours before the gap start.

name: gap_distance_m
description: Distance (in meters) between start and end positions.

name: gap_duration_h
description: Length of the gap (in hours).

name: gap_implied_speed_knots
description: Implied speed during the gap based on gap_duration_h and gap_distance_m.

name: gap_start_timestamp
description: the timestamp of the position at the beginning of the gap

name: gap_start_msgid
description: message ID for last position message before for start of gap

name: gap_start_lat
description: latitude at start of gap

name: gap_start_lon
description: longitude at start of gap

name: gap_start_ais_class
description: AIS device class at start of gap.

name: gap_start_receiver_type
description: receiver type at start of gap

name: gap_start_distance_from_shore_m
description: distance from shore (meters) at start of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_start_distance_from_port_m
description: distance from nearest port (meters) at start of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_end_timestamp
description: the timestamp of the position at the end of the gap

name: gap_end_msgid
description: position message for end of gap

name: gap_end_lat
description: latitude at end of gap

name: gap_end_lon
description: longitude at end of gap

name: gap_end_ais_class
description: AIS device class at end of gap.

name: gap_end_receiver_type
description: receiver type at end of gap

name: gap_end_distance_from_shore_m
description: distance from shore (meters) at end of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: gap_end_distance_from_port_m
description: distance from nearest port (meters) at end of gap (using rasterized distance)

name: is_closed
description: 1 if the gap is closed, 0 if the gap is open
